Read More Guy Harvey Resort St. Augustine Beach’s Commitment to You During COVID-19 First of all, we want to thank our valued guests for their patience and understanding during this time. Our hotel is currently OPEN, but some of our amenities and services are limited or unavailable at this time. We have also updated our cancellation policy to provide the most flexibility to our guests. Please follow the link below to see our full list of changes and updates. COVID19 For the most update information, please refer to Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) or your local health authority.

View Website (904) 471-2555 Guy Harvey Resort (904) 471-2555 On A1A in St. Augustine Beach. 860 A1A Beach Blvd St. Augustine, FL 32080 Check in 4:00 p.m. Check out 11:00 a.m. View Google Map Share This +4 more Guy Harvey Resort St. Augustine Beach offers deluxe beachfront accommodations overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, where guests can view surf, sunrises, and passing boats. Located right on St. Augustine Beach, the property offers direct access to the beach via a short walk from the resort's pool deck. The tiki bar gathering area at Guy Harvey Resort in St. Augustine Gathering Spaces, Food and Drink The pool deck serves as the resort's "social hub," where guests will find an outdoor pool, a sandy "beach" with a fire pit, and screened cabanas where friends can gather. For refreshments, tropical cocktails can be ordered from the tiki bar, while tasty and unique food bites are served from the Asado Grill. Santiago's Florida Kitchen and Craft Bar , the resort's full-service bar and restaurant, serves breakfast and dinner. This dog-friendly resort allows leashed canine guests to join their owners for breakfast or dinner at Santiago's outdoor patio. Fun for Families and Couples A family-friendly resort, Guy Harvey Resort St. Augustine Beach offers several "kid suite" guest rooms, furnished with two bunk beds and one queen bed. Oceanfront guest rooms boast beautiful views of the sea with balconies overlooking the pool area and beach, while the partial ocean view rooms provide a peek at the surf and sand. Resort amenities include convenient beach chair and umbrella rentals from the "pool house" shack on the outdoor pool deck, which also rents other items for the pool and beach— including surf and bodyboards. The Outfitter Shop presents authentic Guy Harvey merchandise, gifts, and vacation essentials and the staff will assist guests in planning an eco-adventure or visits to the local attractions. Great Location Guy Harvey Resort St. Augustine Beach sits on St. Augustine Beach, near shops, restaurants, and the St. Johns County Fishing Pier. The resort is just minutes from St. Augustine's historic downtown and those guests who want to visit the city to shop, tour, and dine can choose to drive their own cars or travel aboard the Old Town Trolley Tours "beach bus." Guy Harvey Resort St. Augustine Beach offers complimentary wireless internet throughout, a 24-hour fitness center, guest laundry facilities, cable television, coffee makers, iron and ironing boards, and complimentary guest parking on-site. Special event and wedding facilities are also available at the resort. The resort event team coordinates magical weddings on the beach and luxurious receptions in one of the resort's event rooms. The Guy Harvey Resort St. Augustine Beach can plan and present private parties, meetings, and other special events in the modern event space. Check-in is at 4:00 p.m. and check-out is at 11:00 a.m. Upcoming Live Music Denny Blue Tomorrow, September 11th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Dewey Via Friday, September 12th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Fond Kiser Saturday, September 13th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Denny Blue Thursday, September 18th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Dewey Via Thursday, September 25th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Greg Johnson Friday, September 26th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Morrow Family Band Saturday, September 27th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Morrow Family Band Saturday, October 4th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Fond Kiser Saturday, October 11th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Denny Blue Thursday, October 16th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Greg Johnson Friday, October 17th, 2025 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm Palmetto Pickers Saturday, October 18th, 2025 4:00 pm - 7:00 pm Pagination Page 1 Next page ›› Guy Harvey Resort (904) 471-2555 On A1A in St. Augustine Beach. 860 A1A Beach Blvd St. Augustine, FL 32080 Check in 4:00 p.m. Check out 11:00 a.m. Share This Profile Keywords Hotels & Motels Pet Friendly Waterfront Wedding Venues St. Augustine Beach Have a Question?
